name: Polymula 1
description: My first test of a cartoon alike race game with time trailmode. it is not the best game created ever but maybe I may improve this game when I get better! Warning: because my C# knowledge is not the best, the game will start immediately, so be ready to Race! the game uses the normal WASD controls. Also I reccomend to play the game in fullscreen mode, that way you can see everything properly!
